name: George Portides
content: Dr George Portides - University of Nicosia Skip to content APPLY Dr George Portides Dr George Portides Assistant Professor School of Sciences and Engineering Department of Computer Science 22841653 [email protected] Central Building›2nd Floor›B215 Brief CV Research Profile George Portides has been a faculty member of the Department of Computer Science since 1997 and 2007 (University of Nicosia). His expertize is in robust statistics, which was the theme of his PhD thesis. His general research interests are in statistical regression modelling within the GLM framework, simulation and statistical computing. George was actively involved in the formation of the new BSc programme in Mathematics offered. He was also the President of the University’s Faculty Union Council between the years 2012-2017.
